# bq-toast

<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Overview

The toast component is designed to wrap the bq-toast-item component.

## Shadow Parts

| Part     | Description                                                     |
| -------- | --------------------------------------------------------------- |
| `"base"` | The component's wrapper that holds the bq-toast-item component. |
